name: MindManager Map Markers File
summary: An MMMS file contains one or more "Map Markers" created by Mindjet MindManager, a visual diagramming application used to organize ideas, plans, and projects. It stores markers, which are icons that can be placed on elements in a map to indicate various information, such as priority or progress completed. MMMS files may contain markers that were included with the software or created by the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
